phrases: That took all of one minute!
And yet AR-D and RM-C were still able to make a powerful statement!
They got totally owned, did not they?
That is going to be trouble.
It is going to take an extraordinary assault to get through that one.
Did you see that match just now?
Those puppets are controlling over five Manadites concurrently.
That is beyond a human's control, but artificial intelligence can handle it!
Is that Uncle Souichi, by any chance?
It is been a long time!
Right, I sent you a new gun.
Meaning that it will not get there in time for your first match.
Could you go over to Customs to check?
But it will not be a problem.
I have got the Arcwandels, so I will be fine.
As long as you are wielding one of my guns, you cannot lose!
Okay, I will be waiting to hear good news from you!
He has not changed one bit, huh?
I will be heading out to Customs, then.
Then I will go with you!
I am going to see if I can sneak into their press conference.
Raise a glass to our first victory.
Actually, we cannot afford to rest on our laurels like that, can we?
Why do not we get a little practice in?
Well, what else could you expect, right?
What kind of attitude is that before our master?
There is no need to hold back against anyone who disrespects our master.
Now, now, why do not you let him off the hook now, RM-C?
In terms of specs, we are more or less equal, so why is it that I am helpless against RM-C?
Oh, well, that cannot be helped!
Woman is Nature's contrivance for perpetuating its highest achievement...
whereas Man is Woman's contrivance for fulfilling Nature's behest in the most economical way.
People had such a way with words in the olden days!
Meaning that because I am a male-type,
I can never defeat RM-C, a female-type?
But anyway, we should head back to our waiting room,
or Camilla will get tired of waiting.
Well, then, I suppose it cannot be helped.
Well, of course I cannot tell you that RM-C's your limiter, can I?
We are not going to get there in time for the start of the match anyway,
so I will let them know that we are running late.
It is not your fault, Julis.
I wanted to practice till the last second, too.
She is a Page One at Le Wolfe.
Jeez, settling old scores is a relic of the past!
If we do not, we will lose face!
What do you want with my tag partner, Lamirexia?
I have no business with you.
Since brawling in the middle of a crowd is beyond dangerous.
They are the ones who started that fight just now.
One false move, and you could be disqualified!
All right, then, why do not you tell me what you would do?
You reacted better than I thought you would.
My sister's caused you so much trouble.
Oh, no, it is not like...
I will be sure to give her an earful.
All right, let us go, Sister.
She called her Sister, so does that mean...
I think there is an entry in the data Claudia sent me.
and there is not a shred of data on her except that she is Irene's partner.
By the way, why did you provoke her like that just now?
Irene said to me, I have no business with you.
Even though I was the one who made the complaint against her!
Meaning that she had some kind of reason to target you.
But I do not even know her.
Knowing Le Wolfe, they could very well have something evil up their sleeve.
I wanted to fish around for some clues, but...
Just listen to the roar of the crowd!
She might have just lost her title the other day,
but Ms. Toudou of Seidoukan Academy is the Super Rookie
who reached Rank 1 as a junior high student!
Apparently, despite her slight stature, she is got an air of perfect composure...
Nanna-yan, Nanna-yan... that one's Ms. Toudou!
The little one is Saya Sasamiya!
Now that was a huge blunder...
And Ayato is not here, either.
They said they are on their way.
They look quite competent, do not they?
Well, we will figure it out.
Which do you want to take on?
Whichever one, I do not mind.
Then I will take the bigger one.
Phoenix Festa, Block L, Round 1, Match 2...
The winner of this fleeting battle is Ms. Toudou!
The little one's putting on a good show herself!
Winners, Saya Sasamiya and Kirin Toudou of Seidoukan Academy!
So it is not as if the gun is just hard?
I have adapted it to use it as an energy field to suppress some of the output.
So that is why you were able to withstand all that close combat.
But it is not as if you are a student of the Amagiri Shinmei-style, right?
But yeah, Ayato did teach me a little.
Oh, wait, you should dry yourself off properly!
What... what... what are you doing?
Since ancient times, they say that massaging increasing the size of your breasts.
That could not be more wrong!
W-We are very sorry, but could you please wait just a bit?
We really are sorry, but the match...
I left everything to you in Round 1.
So now it is my turn!
We are from Queenvail, the school for goddesses!
We are going to do our best!
All right, let the battle begin!
Flame of Torokia, scale the castle walls...
Even I am capable of this much...
Ms. Riessfeld has seized victory through her rock-solid tactical game!
she was luring her opponent into a setting-type trap, huh?
Well, I guess that does it.
Well, not that I fought long enough for it to feel like a job.
By the way, what are your plans for the rest of the day?
If I could, I would like to go to Saya and Kirin's match to cheer them on, but...
By the time we reach the venue, it will be over, probably.
A-And besides, we still have not had lunch, right?
Okay, then let us get that out of the way real quick...
Do not get your hopes up too high!
W-Well, this much I can handle.
Are not you having any, Julis?
Well, of course I will, but...
I do not like being treated unfairly, you know.
To do it for Sasamiya and Toudou, and not for me...
That just does not stand to reason, does it?
Well, it is not as if I absolutely need you do it, but...
Why do not we see how the other matches turned out?
All right, first to strike is the Lester-Randy team!
Both Lester and Randy are keeping their distance from Irene...
What could their purpose be, I wonder?
The Gravi-Sheath is a powerful Ogre Lux with the ability to control gravity.
But since it is apparently the type of weapon that is effective against targeted locations,
I believe they are trying to avoid being subjected to those effects by constantly moving.
And the Gravi-Sheath's most glaring flaw
is that it is a gas-guzzler!
They say that no student has ever been able to withstand its side-effects.
In other words, the longer we drag this fight out, the greater our advantage!
And while we are buying time...
Let us see what this girl's made of!
Every last one of you... springing the same tired old strategy on me!
I am telling you, that is so pedestrian!
I will get to you later.
Hey, you are just as tough as I thought!
Who do you think you are dealing with?
Damn... guess I have no choice.
I am going to show you what it is like when I go all out.
What the heck is going on?
Most likely, that kid sister must be a Regenerative.
Someone with the power to heal her own wounds?
And if she is even capable of regenerating lost blood, she is elite.
That is an unheard-of secret weapon.
It seeks blood in return for its powers.
With normal use, it drains itself dry before you know it.
That is why it alters its wielder's body, like you just saw,
allowing it to absorb blood from an external source.
So you are literally a vampire, huh?
Oh, I intensified the gravity a little.
If you want to catch my gravity balls,
at the very least you will have to bring an Ogre Lux with you!
All right, you still want to fight?
Although we got ourselves an easy win.
But listen, you guys, he is still a Page One.
No, I mean, he just did not match up well with them.
Let us just leave it at that, all right?
